text:
Good variety of dishes that are decent tasting. But the lady seller can be grumpy and unpleasant at times.

Her shop has the CDC voucher sign displayed. When I asked to pay by CDC voucher she screamed at me saying in the morning she
is always busy cooking and has no time for this payment mode and why didnâ€™t I ask her beforehand?

I told her it was not a problem I would go get cash from my car and return in 5 mins. She answered â€œWho knows if you will returnâ€?

I also heard her scolding the customer before me who requested for bee hoon - â€œcanâ€™t you see we are selling riceâ€?

On another occasion someone commented that her squid was expensive and she flew into a rage.

So just buy your food, talk less and leave. ğŸ˜œ
